title: Asha Dandu
description: Recruiter, Product Manager, Hobbyist and newbie Blogger :)

home.title: Hi! I'm Asha
home.description:
Hey there ğŸ™‹ Thank you for stopping by ğŸ™\
I'm a recruiter by profession and help various clients hire the best talent. 

I'm a curious soul who enjoys learning about new trends in the market and software products that offer solutions to simple everyday problems. My current interest revolves around software project management, product life cycle, product branding, strategy, marketing and monetization.

As a result, I'm trying my hands in project management lately. You would see some raw, real time experiences about project management on this blog. You have a business idea you'd like to discuss, I'd be interested to hear that.

I wish to document âœ my thoughts and various other interests on this blog. I hope to keep you entertained and be informative at the same time.
